title: Wind of Destiny
description: After wealthy, young Kyle Hughes shares a brief but memorable sailing excursion with lovely missions nurse Rhonda Lyttle, they both embark on a riveting journey neither of them foresaw. Join Rhonda and Kyle as they chase each other across the globe, continuing to meet 'coincidentally' as the years pass. Wind of Destiny serves to remind us all that God is truly pervasive in all aspects of our lives. Lovers of romance and travel alike will get caught up in the captivating suspense and wonderfully descriptive imagery as they eagerly turn the pages to discover where the Wind of Destiny will blow Rhonda and Kyle next.
author: Louis H. Campbell
